attributes.action: condemn Nicaragua for outlawing all abortion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: President Enrique Bolanos of Nicaragua has signed into law a ban on all abortions, even when the mother's life is judged to be at risk. This will lead to an increase in maternal and infant mortality. We call upon the Prime Minister to condemn Nicaragua and other countries with such laws restricting a women's right to choose.
